product_title:
CHANCE EAU TENDRE
EAU DE TOILETTE SPRAY
product_description:
What it is: A delicate an unexpected fruity-floral fragrance for women that creates a soft whirlwind of happiness, fantasy and radiance.
Fragrance story: A green and fruity grapefruit-quince accord intertwines with the softness of jasmine and the smoothness of white musks for an intoxicatingly light, floral trail.
Notes: Grapefruit, quince, jasmine, white musks.
Item # 289263
